definition[0]: if an engine ticks over, it works while the vehicle is not moving
example[0]: Mark left the engine ticking over and went back inside.
definition[1]: if a system, business etc ticks over, it continues working but without producing very much or without much happening
example[1]: The business is just about ticking over.
example[2]: Jane will keep things ticking over while Iâ€™m away.
definition[2]: if a system, business etc ticks over, it goes on working but without producing much or without much happening
example[3]: The market did little more than tick over.
